title: White Australia Policy
creator_credit: Unifed Productions and Student Action of Melbourne University
brief_description: A documentary record culled from television and other news reports on the White Australia Policy as it found expression in topical incidents in 1961, 1962 and 1963. It is a protest against the White Australia Policy and a record of the events in the history of Student Action. Compiled and edited by Peter Tammer. Dedicated to the memory of Bill Thomas, student leader.
